KEYWORDS.developing nations: các quốc gia đang phát triển
KEYWORDS.at least one possible solution: ít nhất một giải pháp có thể

TASK: The world is experiencing a dramatic increase in population. This is causing problems not only for the poor in undeveloped countries but also for industrialized and developing nations. Describe some of the problems that overpopulation causes, and suggest at least one possible solution.
